## Self-reading Before Meet-up

Read before lesson:

-   Kingsley E. Haynes and A. Stewart Fotheringham (2020) [**Gravity and Spatial Interaction Models**](https://researchrepository.wvu.edu/rri-web-book/16/), Web Book of Regional Science. Chapter 1 and Sub-section 2.2.

-   Farmer, C. and Oshan, T. (2017). ["Spatial interaction"](https://gistbok.ucgis.org/bok-topics/spatial-interaction). **The Geographic Information Science & Technology Body of Knowledge** (4th Quarter 2017 Edition), John P. Wilson (ed.). DOI: 10.22224/gistbok/2017.4.5 (link is external)

-   Flowerdew R, Aitkin M (1982) ["A method of fitting the gravity model based on the Poisson distribution"](https://www.academia.edu/38321611/A_Method_of_Fitting_the_Gravity_Model_Based_on_the_Poisson_Distribution_). *Journal of Regional Science*, 22: 191--202.
